de.uni_koeln.spinfo.strings.plugin.algo
Class KMismatch

java.lang.Object
  de.uni_koeln.spinfo.strings.plugin.algo.KMismatch

public class KMismatch
extends java.lang.Object

K-Mismatch check as described in Gusfield 1999:200 f. and modified for words/sentences.

TODO: uses a naive computation of longest common extension, for that, a suffix tree should be used, see LCE

Author:
Fabian Steeg (fsteeg)

Method Detail

getMatches

public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getMatches(java.lang.String t,
                                                                java.lang.String p,
                                                                int k)
K-Mismatch check as described in Gusfield 1999:200 f.

Parameters:
t - The text
p - The pattern
k - the number of allowed mismatches
Returns:
Returns a Collection of Strings containing the k-mismatch-matches of p found in t

getWordBasedMatches

public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getWordBasedMatches(java.lang.String t,
                                                                         java.lang.String p,
                                                                         int k)
K-Mismatch check as described in Gusfield 1999:200 f., modified for words and sentences

Parameters:
t - The text, containing multiple blankspace-separeted words
p - The pattern, containing multiple blankspace-separeted words
k - the number of allowed mismatches
Returns:
Returns a Collection of Strings containing the matches with k-mismatches of p found in t
